participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, Sophie loves to express herself through dance and art. She is optimistic and enjoys helping others discover their own passions.
participant_1.background: My boss doesn't know that I'm an art student, but I'm hoping to show him my portfolio soon. My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK. Dancing is my passion. I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive. I get to show off my long fingernails.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Curious and friendly, Liam enjoys sharing his thoughts and experiences with others. He has a playful side and values creativity and connection in his life.
participant_2.background: I collect dragon figurines that remind me of my childhood. I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it. I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I haven't been in a fight, but I've been in situations where I felt threatened because of my sexuality. Yes, my car is a Ferrari.

content.text: What's your favorite thing about being a student?
I like the freedom to learn what I want and when I want.
My favorite thing is dancing. It's my passion.
What kind of dancing do you like?
I love ballet and hip hop.
I've always wanted to try ballet.
You should! It's really fun and it's a great workout.
I'm not sure if I'm flexible enough, but I'll definitely look into it.
You can start out taking beginner classes and see how you like it.
That's a great idea. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to help people find their passion.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm an art student.
That's awesome! What kind of art do you create?
I mostly do painting and drawing, but I'm also interested in sculpture and photography.
Wow, you're really talented! I've always admired artists.
Thanks for the compliment!
So, what's your favorite thing about being an artist?
I love being able to express myself creatively. It's a great way to relax and have fun.
I can imagine. I wish I had more artistic talent.
You can always learn! It's never too late to start.
Maybe I will! I've always wanted to take an art class.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the encouragement
